learner-signup.subject: Codec Signup Successful
learner-signup.text:
Welcome to Codec, <Name>!

You've accomplished your first step to exploring the fun and challenging learning experience as a coder. It doesn't matter if you are a newbie or a pro, we look forward to collaborating and learning with each other in this space.

Thank you,
Your Codec Team

mentor-signup.subject: Codec Mentor Signup Successful
mentor-signup.text:
Welcome to Codec, <Name>!

Thank you for joining our Mentor Community. In learning to program, half the brains are in crafting problems. We encourage you to collaborate with the community by sharing your knowledge in our classrooms. Please remember to follow basic online etiquette to keep the community safe and enjoyable.

Thank you,
Your Codec Team

forgot-password.subject: Password Change Request
forgot-password.text:
Hi <Name>,

We have received a password change request for your Codec account. To update your password, click the temporary link below:

<Link>

This link will expire after <Number> hours. If you did not request for a password change, please ignore this email, no changes will be made. Another person may have accidentally entered your details by accident.

We are happy to help,

Your Codec Team.
